titles.title: Nostalgia ~あの時, あの場所で~ / The changing heart ~素直な感情~ / Flower~芽生える感情?~
Nostalgia ～그 때 그 장소에서～ / The changing heart ～솔직한 감정～ / Flower ～싹트는 감정?～
Nostalgia: Ano Toki, Ano Basho de / The Changing Heart: Sunao na Kanjou / Flower: Mebaeru Kanjou?
Nostalgia: Back Then at That Place / The Changing Heart: Honest Feelings / Flower: Budding Feelings
